channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 16th September
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AND TAKE PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE PLEASE CUT BACK OVERGROWN OVER HANGING HEDGE WHICH DOSE BELONG TO THE SCHOOL BUT IS OBSTRUCTIVE TO FOOTWAY approximately 2 metres x4 metres (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 16th September
item.description:
F/W closure signage Please reset 3 QTY rocking slab next to each other - 1800mm x 900mm x 25mm - 1.62m2 Patch - ENWD - F/W closure signage (FW Rocking/Unstable Slab)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 16th September
item.description:
Damaged School direction sign, been removed on 2hr Emergency. Can you please pass on to the relevant AHR to arrange reinstatement.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 16th September
item.description:
